
Changelog
=========


0.4.0 (2019-06)
-----------------------------------------

* Update dogpile.cache version to 0.7.1
* Allow recipe core to specify an optional cache_region
* Use pip-compile

0.3.1 (2018-03-14)
-----------------------------------------

* Update requirements to not pin specific recipe

0.3.0 (2018-03-09)
-----------------------------------------

* Code cleanups

0.2.2 (2018-01-23)
-----------------------------------------

* Fix key mangler when there's no prefix

0.2.1 (2018-01-23)
-----------------------------------------

* Fix docs, region

0.2.0 (2018-01-23)
-----------------------------------------

* No changes


0.1.0 (2017-02-05)
-----------------------------------------

* First release on PyPI.
